nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_134
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I don't mind his staying out so late as long as he behaves himself.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_135
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I prefer his plan to others in that I think no plan is more practical than his.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_136
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: They broke off business relations with that company as it suffered huge losses in the last fiscal year and went bankrupt.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_137
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Now that you don't like him, why did you invite him to your birthday party in the first place?

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_138
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Though we knew our chances to win were slim, we were more or less depressed when we lost in the game.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_139
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Perhaps this was the price that has to be paid for progressâ€”who knows?
